course.subject: CIVL
course.name: Numerical Solutions to Geotechnical Problems
course.description: Use of specific and general-purpose computer software to solve common geotechnical problems associated with empirical relationships, seepage, consolidation, pile applications, excavations, and general soil behavior.  Brief introductions to and applications of finite difference, finite element and other numerical solution techniques are included.

reviews.author: HKUST-1
reviews.title: 翻過geo consultant intern就唔使讀
reviews.comment_content:
成個course 得4樣嘢你會學到
1. Finite Difference Method 咩嚟
2. Finite Element method 咩嚟
3. 點用seep/w 同slope/w
4. 點用plaxis2d

上網都學到嘅嘢嚟

有份team project:
group完5個人做唔同task最後share data再各自打自己嘅independent individual report
最後有個presentation

講多少少 咁佢大半part上堂都係會講theory先再講啲software點用
咁呢個approach有咩問題呢
就係佢啲notes太incomplete
比如話佢俾咗好多張slide去derive Finite Difference Method
但係啲slide冇講到啲variable同啲式點樣變出嚟
你要俾50蚊買佢份好厚嘅實體notes先會有完整嘅derive
但份實體notes其實冇乜用
因為份notes主要係講你數學上點樣用Differential Equation去solve啲geotechnical problem
which is in practice所謂嘅入機就做到嘅野嚟
即係份notes話緊俾你知部機點解會計個result出嚟
但PDE呢個坑太深
大部份civil ug仔都唔會識
所以真係聽下就算
有心去學先再研究
reviews.comment_teaching:
吉東教學麻麻，最主要係你聽唔明佢啲英文，同埋佢唔識教，你可以當佢係劣版王剛。

不過佢真係好好好有心，同佢傾計你會feel到佢係勁nice勁願意share同教你的
reviews.comment_grading:
5份assignment 1份team project
50% HW
40% report
10% presentation

assignment睇source做就會識，冇source就搵你身邊嘅civil soc朋友拎

team project: HARDCORE
今年team project係redo 一次bangkok mtr station construction嘅simulation。咁點解係hardcore呢
因為除咗soil parameter 之外其他都要自己by common sense 去估
比如你做els係抽水再掘，掘低過strut level少少再裝strut
之後個gwt有特別位係個site唔係hydrostatic
你要跟佢俾你嘅water pressure 去畫多次個underground water level
之後做完幾次之後你要做slope/w 同seep/w做多次
seep/w做唔到, 所以professor最尾話唔使做
用slope/w 計下fos就得
你要喺plaxis 啲data度拎啲axial force input 落個slope/w度simulate slab resistance to lateral earth pressure
而plaxis係好易做到炒
所以hardcore

grading等出grade再更新，俾住個B先

3/1/2023 update:
出咗grade A咗 所以grading轉做A
HW1 100 (mean 95.5 median 100)
HW2 100 (mean 94.09 median 100)
HW3 80 (mean 95,74 median 100)
HW4 98 (mean 90.85 median 90)
HW5 95 (mean 90.37 median 95)
Team Project 100 (mean 91.96 median 95)
Presentation 80/100 好似話highest 6 of the class
Professor話如果hw3唔炒嘅話就A+
28個人讀 UQ全部都係100嚟

reviews.author: soman
reviews.comment_content:
Tentative Course Syllabus

Use of computers in geomechanics
Using numerical methods and computers in geomechanics
Analysis of a geotechnical / foundation engineering problem
Analytical solutions to geotechnical problems
Quick survey of numerical methods and programs
Categorization of mathematical problems types
Numerical errors
Introduction to the finite difference and finite element methods
Strong formulation – Introduction to the finite difference (FD) method
Formulation of the problem
Formulation of numerical solutions
Solution procedures for an axially loaded 1D pile (by hand)
Finite difference solution of Terzaghi’s one-dimensional consolidation
Weak formulation – Introduction to the finite element method (FEM)
Formulation of the problem
Finite element equations
Gaussian quadrature
Solution of the axially loaded pile problem
Tutorial: Finite Difference Analysis of Terzaghi’s 1D Analysis
Two-dimensional finite element method for seepage analysis
Theory of volumetric water content and permeability functions
2D finite element formulations
Use of Geo-Slope program SEEP/W
Tutorials: Seepage analysis I (Steady-state analysis)
                      Seepage analysis II (Transient analysis-analysis of water infiltration)

Slope stability analysis
Basic concepts
Slope stability analysis methods
USE of Slope/W
Cooperation with finite element method
Tutorials: Slope stability analysis using Slope/W (I)
                      Stability of a slope during rainfall infiltration (II)

Introduction to constitutive models of soils
Basic principles
Brief introduction to continuum mechanics
Overview of constitutive models
Introduction to elastic, perfectly plastic, and critical state models
Determination of critical state soil parameters using laboratory tests
Typical model parameters for soils and rocks
Two-dimensional finite element procedures for stress-strain analysis
2D finite element procedures and FE discretisation
Mesh considerations
Problems that can arise with elements
Obtaining a convergent solution
Applying initial and in-situ conditions
Displacement boundary conditions
Construction sequence
Methods for undrained /drained /consolidation analyses
Tutorials:      Analysis of strip footing on sand using PLAXIS 2D
                           Analysis of excavation using a tie-back wall by PLAXIS 2D

Two-dimensional finite difference procedures and use of FLAC
Background of FLAC
General solution procedures
Boundary and initial conditions
Loading and sequential modelling
Slope stability analysis–strength reduction technique
Tutorials: Excavation analysis with FLAC2D
                       Slope stability analysis with FLAC2D
reviews.comment_grading: Lots of people get A range
reviews.comment_workload: 做三份PROJECT, 無MT, FINAL算係咁啦

reviews.comment_workload:
主要係做三個group projects,無功課，無考試。
認真上tutorial,基本上都會識做。

reviews.author: Solomon
reviews.comment_content:
FDM
FEM
SLOPE/W
PLAXIS 2D
all useful but can learn by yourself
reviews.comment_teaching: average, prof put much efford on explaining the theories. His english is not so good, but still comprehensive if you are patient eoungh.

reviews.comment_workload:
Term project high workload
literature for project requires time for digesting

reviews.author: johndoe
reviews.comment_content:
Syllabus:

1. Use of computers in geomechanics
2. Introduction to the finite difference and finite element methods
3. Two-dimensional finite element method for seepage analysis
4. Slope stability analysis
5. Introduction to constitutive models of soils
6. Two-dimensional finite element procedures for stress-strain analysis
7. Two-dimensional finite difference procedures and use of FLAC

簡單而言, 就係深入教soil mechanic中soil plasticity嘅部分,  geotech中常用software嘅原理及應用
reviews.comment_teaching: 雖然Professor嘅英文口音有啲難明, 但係佢份人相當nice, 唔明白內容/點做project時, 只要肯問基本上都會答, 啲project太難時又肯extend deadline
reviews.comment_grading:
第一份Project 93分, 大概係少少below mean (成個course大部分人拎93, 部分係95-97, 小部分係90 or 99)
其餘兩份assignment分數唔知道, 最後有A
reviews.comment_workload:
2份group projects (2-3人一組)
一份individual assignment

Week 5開始出第一份assignment, 每份assignment平均有2星期嘅時間做, 每份assignment平均要寫6,7版紙, 加上第一份assignment需要將numerical model calibrate 到模擬真實情況, workload較吃重
